name: Die or Die (byDan)
description:
Battle against your foes using dice
Fight for the chance to "DIE" your enemies, but beware, that you may also "Die"

The strategy? There is none, this is completely random.
Good luck, I guess.

GAMEPLAY
Walk around, pick up die from the floor, fight against another "Die Masters" and against growing up.

CONTROLS

ASDF /Arrows:  Movement
SPACEBAR: Confirm 
ALT +F4: Quit game
